data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_d3a3a55c22000ae78732fed8cba2efef.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Joy becomes <font color="a6aafb">Angry!</font> each time her skill hits a non-Minion enemy, dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and increasing her Movement Speed by 60% that decays over 4s (hitting the <font color="a6aafb">Leonin Crystal</font> will also grant the Movement Speed effect). This effect has a cooldown of 4s for each target.

Joy's Basic Attack will deal 65<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font>  <font color="62f8fe">(+65% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

Joy summons a <font color="a6aafb">Leonin Crystal</font> at the target location, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The <font color="a6aafb">Leonin Crystal</font> lasts up to 2s.

Joy dashes in the target direction, dealing 120<font color="62f8fe"> (+55% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in her path. Hitting an enemy or the <font color="a6aafb">Leonin Crystal</font> allows Joy to cast this skill again within 0.8s and gain 1 <font color="a6aafb">Beat Energy</font>. Casting this skill on the beat increases the skill damage by 100% and grants a 80<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> shield that lasts 3s.

This skill can be cast up to 4 times in succession.

Joy increases her Physical & Magic Defense by 15<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font> and gains 30% Movement Speed. Over the next 3s, she pulses 8 times, dealing 120<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> each time to nearby enemies.
Each <font color="a6aafb">Meow, Rhythm of Joy!</font> cast on the beat increases this skill's damage by 40%. If perfect rhythm is achieved by hitting every beat with <font color="a6aafb">Meow, Rhythm of Joy!</font>, Joy also gains 40% Spell Vamp while this skill is active.
This skill unlocks when Joy acquires <font color="a6aafb">Beat Energy</font>. Casting this skill with 3 <font color="a6aafb">Beat Energy</font> will remove all debuffs on Joy and make her immune to slow effects while this skill is active.

data.name: Joy

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Balanced burst and sustainability. Enter teamfights later to finish off all enemies.

+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by <%Num1>. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover <%Num1> of Lost HP and gain <%Num2> Movement Speed.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Hybrid Lifesteal
+70 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equiptips:
+45 Adaptive Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Cooldown Reduction

recommendmasterplan.name: The Prestige Moji
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The "Child of Miracle" who returned to the Leonins after years of wandering.

assist.desc: Joy works best with heroes with that can provide powerful support or have strong initiation, like Angela and Hylos.

strong.desc: Joy is strong against heroes that lack mobility or rely on CC, like Xavier and Vexana, because she has an easier time hitting them with her 2nd Skill while being immune to their CC's.

weak.desc: Joy is countered by heroes that can restrict mobility skills, such as Minsitthar and Khufra, due to her kit's heavy reliance on her 2nd Skill.
